typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	File as string,
	Directory as string,
	ExecutionDate as timestamp,
	RunId as string
}
source(output(
		BookingID as long,
		RoomSpaceID as long,
		EntryID as long,
		EntryStatusEnum as long,
		RoomTypeID as long,
		GroupID as long,
		RoomLocationID as long,
		Start_BookingReasonID as long,
		End_BookingReasonID as long,
		BookingTypeID as long,
		RoomRateID as long,
		BookingLinkTypeEnum as long,
		TermSessionID as long,
		HousekeepingID as long,
		EntryInvitationID as long,
		RoomLocationFixed as boolean,
		RoomRateAmount as double,
		CheckInDate as string,
		CheckOutDate as string,
		ETA as long,
		ETD as long,
		CheckInDateActual as string,
		CheckOutDateActual as string,
		DateChargedTo as string,
		ContractDateStart as string,
		ContractDateEnd as string,
		ResvChargeToEntry as boolean,
		NumberOfGuests as long,
		NumberOfGuestsFree as long,
		NumberOfChildren as long,
		NumberOfChildrenFree as long,
		SpecialRequirement as string,
		Comments as string,
		DateBilled as string,
		AutoAllocationDetail as string,
		AdditionalOccupantCount as long,
		EmotionalSupportAnimalCount as long,
		ServiceAnimalCount as long,
		PetCount as long,
		PaidTo as string,
		Excess as double,
		CustomBit1 as boolean,
		CustomBit2 as boolean,
		CustomBit3 as boolean,
		CustomBit4 as boolean,
		CustomString1 as string,
		CustomString2 as string,
		CustomString3 as string,
		CustomString4 as string,
		CustomString5 as string,
		CustomString6 as string,
		CustomString7 as string,
		CustomString8 as string,
		CustomString9 as string,
		CustomString10 as string,
		CustomDate1 as string,
		CustomDate2 as string,
		CustomDate3 as string,
		CustomDate4 as string,
		SecurityUserID as long,
		DateModifiedBilling as string,
		DateCreated as string,
		DateModified as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StructuredFile
StructuredFile derive(HASH = sha2(512,columns()),
		ExecutionCreatedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionLogId = $RunId) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['HASH'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: []) ~> Current
